Package parallel

parallel package: an implementation of all the synchronization, communication & coordination primitives required in popt4jlib.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ComparableTaskObject empty interface for use with dynamic, priority-based task msg-passing coordinators and executors.
TaskObject interface defining what a TaskObject must support.

atomic A class implementing the critical section protocol in Java.
atomictest

BarrierTest

BlockingFasterMsgPassingTest  
BlockingMsgPassingCoordinator The BlockingMsgPassingCoordinator class is yet another Singleton class that implements the rendevouz mechanism in parallel programming.
BlockingMsgPassingTest  
BoundedBuffer a bounded-length FIFO buffer implemented as a cyclic doubly-linked list.
BoundedBufferArray a bounded-length FIFO buffer implemented as an Object Array.
ComplexBarrier A class implementing the Barrier concept in parallel/distributed computing.
ComplexBarrierTest  
ConditionCounter implements a "condition" counter, so that when the object's counter reaches a specified number, it releases a notification for any waiting thread to resume execution.
DMCoordinator Title: Thread Coordination Management System Description: Class providing proper synchronization between readers and writers.
DMCTest Title: parallel Description: minimal test Copyright: Copyright (c) 2003 Company:
DMCTest2 class simulates the data access synchronization processes in AMORE (AIT MOvie Recommendation Engine).
DMCThread Title: parallel Description: Minimal Test Thread Copyright: Copyright (c) 2003 Company:
DynamicAsynchTaskExecutor A faster class that implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently tasks implementing the Runnable interface.
FairDMCoordinator Title: Thread Coordination Management System Description: Same as DMCoordinator class, but guarantees FIFO order of threads' execution (i.e. if a writer thread arrives before a reader, the writer will execute before the reader, and vice-versa).
FasterParallelAsynchBatchPriorityTaskExecutor A faster class that implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently batch of tasks implementing the ComparableTaskObject interface.
FasterParallelAsynchBatchTaskExecutor A faster class that implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently a batch of tasks implementing the TaskObject, or more simply, the Runnable interface.
FDMCTest tests the FairDMCoordinator class methods.
FIFOLock class that ensures First-In-First-Served lock acquisition among threads.
FIFOLockTest tests the FairDMCoordinator class methods.
FPABTETest  
LimitedTimeTaskExecutor A class that allows its users to execute tasks (object that describe some computation that must implement the TaskObject interface) for a limited time, starting them in different threads than the thread that called the execute(task) method.
Lock Standard Lock mechanism for thread coordination.
LTTETest  
MsgPassingCoordinator The MsgPassingCoordinator class is yet another class that allows sending and receiving (synchronous and asynchronous) data between threads.
MsgPassingTest  
OrderedBarrier Title: popt4jlib Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java The class guarantees that if threads are synchronized via the OrderedBarrier class, any tasks given as args to the orderedBarrier(task) call, will execute in the order with which the threads executing them were first registered with the barrier (via the addThread(thread) call).
OrderedBarrierTest  
PABTETest  
ParallelAsynchBatchTaskExecutor A class that implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently a batch of tasks implementing the TaskObject, or more simply, the Runnable interface.
ParallelBatchTaskExecutor A class that implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently a batch of tasks implementing the TaskObject, or more simply, the Runnable interface.
PBTETest  
Semaphore Class implementing the classical notion of Semaphores as "permits".
SemaphoreTest  
SimpleFasterMsgPassingCoordinator The SimpleFasterMsgPassingCoordinator class is yet another class that allows sending and receiving (synchronous and asynchronous) data between threads.
SimplePriorityMsgPassingCoordinator The SimplePriorityMsgPassingCoordinator class: yet another class that allows sending and receiving (synchronous and asynchronous) data between threads.
TimerThread Utility class, similar (but simpler) to the ones found in concurrent utils.
 

Exception Summary
ParallelException  
ParallelExceptionUnsubmittedTasks encapsulates any unsubmitted tasks to executors.
 

Package parallel Description

parallel package: an implementation of all the synchronization, communication & coordination primitives required in popt4jlib.

Package Specification

Primitives required for the parallel implementation of the optimization algorithms in this library, including semaphores, atomic execution of critical sections, message passing, read/write shared/exclusive access (with built-in checking of the validity of the calls), barrier and ordered barriers, thread-pools and limited-time task executors.
